content: I received the settings from my server, and my domain name is hvc.rr.com, not the one that you assumed when I first tried this ungodly process. Excactly what do we need to do to get this set up? I'll try to be nice, but working with online contacts is getting increasingly frustratingly complex.
creator: tincanman

content: None of the solutions on the right solve the problem. If anyone is looking lets get it resolved.
creator: tincanman

content:
For hvc.rr.com accounts, Spectrum suggests:

incoming IMAP mail.twc.com, 993, SSL/TLS, normal password, email address

outgoing SMTP mail.twc.com, 587, STARTTLS, normal password, email address

Post your settings to compare.
creator: sfhowes

content:
You should use https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird instead of https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/new/thunderbird

The bm is abbreviation for Bamanankan.

You can also use https://support.mozilla.org/questions/new/thunderbird and will likely default to https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird for you.
creator: James

content: Workaround: first login in your trusted Chrome browser. And don't stop to think how your login leaks from trusted Chrome to Thunderbird.
creator: firefox.com.yes.really

content:
Hi,

I am writing to report a critical issue with Thunderbird email client synchronization for our Thunderbird email account, upshaw.uic77@upshaw.ph.

I have confirmed that the same issues are occurring when accessing the email through webmail.

Please see the attached screenshots from both webmail and Thunderbird, which demonstrate the following errors:

1. Email Synchronization: Emails and sent items are not updated for the year 2022 and this month, October 2024. The synchronization is incomplete. 2. Email Contacts: Our email contacts are missing. The contacts displayed in the screenshot are outdated.

This issue is causing significant disruption to our communication and workflow. We urgently request your assistance in resolving this problem.


Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

Kean
creator: keancabling.upshaw
